Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored the equalizer in stoppage time
Jordan Pickford made a clearance error leading to Belgium's first goal
Lewis Dunk miskicked allowing Romelu Lukaku to score Belgium's second goal
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate wanted a statement victory against Belgium
Southgate was without three of his favoured back four - Kyle Walker, Harry Maguire, and Luke Shaw
Post-Match Reflections: Stones said he was not sure how he felt after leaving the field
Southgate's team showed fighting spirit despite the setbacks
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ivan Toney scored his first England goal via penalty
Kobbie Mainoo provided spark and made a strong case to join the squad for the European Championship finals
